BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[DatabaseLog]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DatabaseLog] ([DatabaseLogID] int,
[PostTime] datetime,
[DatabaseUser] nvarchar(128),
[Event] nvarchar(128),
[Schema] nvarchar(128),
[Object] nvarchar(128),
[TSQL] nvarchar(4000),
[XmlEvent] varchar(8000));

[ErrorLine] int,
[ErrorMessage] nvarchar(4000));
